Title: Provides internet access and access to internet-enabled devices to recipients of public assistance and to adults and children in shelters and similar facilities
Summary: Provides for internet access and access to internet-enabled devices to recipients of public assistance and to adults and children in shelters, domestic violence residence programs, and other adult and children residence facilities.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to providing internet access and access to internet-enabled devices to recipients of public assistance and to adults and children in shelters, domestic violence residence programs, and other adult and children residence facilities
